export var n6=new Intl.NumberFormat("en-us",{style:"decimal",minimumFractionDigits:0,maximumFractionDigits:6});export var n4=new Intl.NumberFormat("en-us",{style:"decimal",minimumFractionDigits:0,maximumFractionDigits:4});export var c2=new Intl.NumberFormat("en-us",{style:"currency",currency:"USD",minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2});/**
 * Returns a string of form "abc...xyz"
 * @param {string} str string to string
 * @param {number} n number of chars to keep at front/end
 * @returns {string}
 */export var getEllipsisTxt=function getEllipsisTxt(str){var n=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:6;if(str){return"".concat(str.slice(0,n),"...").concat(str.slice(str.length-n));}return"";};export var tokenValue=function tokenValue(value,decimals){return decimals?value/Math.pow(10,decimals):value;};/**
 * Return a formatted string with the symbol at the end
 * @param {number} value integer value
 * @param {number} decimals number of decimals
 * @param {string} symbol token symbol
 * @returns {string}
 */export var tokenValueTxt=function tokenValueTxt(value,decimals,symbol){return"".concat(n4.format(tokenValue(value,decimals))," ").concat(symbol);};
